AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Maria De Jesus Garcia: defendant in a trial related to illegal alien smuggling, appealing the use of the Allen charge
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.5th Circuit Court of Appeals: court where the appeal regarding the Allen charge is being considered
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.undocumented aliens: individuals being smuggled in relation to Maria De Jesus Garcia's case, potentially hidden in a pickup truck camper with fogged windows, appearing unwashed and unkempt, including Mexican citizens and illegal aliens found during an immigration inspection on Interstate Highway 35, exhibiting efforts to avoid detection
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States-Mexican border: geographic boundary relevant to smuggling, considered in determining the legality of stops by roving United States Border Patrol agents
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.illegal alien smugglers: individuals apprehended by United States Border Patrol agents near the location of the instant stop
